The room is located close to major attractions such as the Lisbon Cathedral and São Jorge Castle. With a 6% discount for extended stays, this room is perfect for travelers looking to immerse themselves in Lisbon’s rich culture and vibrant atmosphere.

review: Relaxing villa, wonderful massage, gorgeous poolside view.
room_description: This poolside villa in Bali offers 480 sq ft of luxury, featuring a king-size bed, open-air bathroom, and direct access to a private pool. Guests are treated to a complimentary Balinese massage, allowing them to unwind in paradise. The villa is located in a tranquil area near Seminyak Beach, perfect for sunbathing and exploring local markets. With an 8% discount for longer stays, this villa provides a perfect escape for travelers seeking relaxation and luxury in one of the world’s most beautiful tropical destinations.

review: Beautiful view, enjoyed the cruise, comfortable stay.
room_description: This canal view room in Amsterdam offers 370 sq ft of Dutch charm, featuring a queen-size bed, en-suite bathroom, and large windows overlooking the picturesque canals. Guests enjoy a complimentary canal cruise, giving them a unique perspective of the city’s historic architecture. The room is located in the heart of Amsterdam, close to the Anne Frank House and Rijksmuseum. With a 5% discount for extended stays, this room is perfect for travelers wanting to explore the rich culture and beauty of Amsterdam from a cozy and scenic retreat.

review: Lovely suite, fantastic tasting, great historical vibe.
room_description: This Renaissance suite in Florence offers 400 sq ft of historical elegance, featuring a king-size bed, marble bathroom, and classic Italian furnishings. Guests enjoy a complimentary wine and cheese tasting, featuring local Tuscan delicacies. The suite is located near the Uffizi Gallery and Ponte Vecchio, making it ideal for exploring Florence’s rich artistic heritage. With a 7% discount for longer stays, this suite is perfect for travelers seeking a luxurious and culturally immersive experience in the heart of Tuscany.

review: Charming room, loved the tango lesson, vibrant city.
room_description: This boutique room in Buenos Aires offers 350 sq ft of stylish comfort, featuring a queen-size bed, modern bathroom, and colorful decor. Guests are treated to a complimentary tango lesson, providing a taste of Argentina’s passionate culture. The room is located in the trendy Palermo neighborhood, known for its nightlife, cafes, and street art. With a 5% discount for extended stays, this room is ideal for travelers wanting to experience the vibrant spirit and culture of Buenos Aires while enjoying a cozy and stylish retreat.

review: Breathtaking views, great wine tour, lovely suite.
room_description: This Table Mountain suite in Cape Town offers 450 sq ft of luxurious comfort, featuring a king-size bed, en-suite bathroom, and private balcony with stunning views of Table Mountain and the ocean. Guests enjoy a complimentary wine tour in the nearby Cape Winelands, exploring South Africa’s renowned vineyards. The suite is located close to the V&A Waterfront and beaches, perfect for relaxation and adventure. With an 8% discount for longer stays, this suite is ideal for travelers seeking both luxury and adventure in one of the world’s most beautiful cities.

review: Delightful experience, loved the cooking class, warm atmosphere.
room_description: This heritage room in Hanoi offers 340 sq ft of Vietnamese charm, featuring a queen-size bed, en-suite bathroom, and traditional decor. Guests are treated to a complimentary cooking class, allowing them to learn how to prepare authentic Vietnamese dishes. The room is located in the Old Quarter, known for its bustling markets and historic streets. With a 5% discount for extended stays, this room is perfect for travelers wanting to immerse themselves in Vietnam’s rich culture while enjoying a comfortable and welcoming retreat.
